modName: Niphriel - A Wood Elf Necro Ranger Follower
summary: Niphriel is a wood elf Necro Ranger follower. Besides being good with a bow and one-handed weapons, she reanimates the dead and even summons a piece of her own soul in the form of a copy - an "echo" - of herself. Compatible with UFO.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][b][i][color=#ffff00]Skyrim SE version nowÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2990]available[/url][/color][/i][/b]

[u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
Niphriel is a very capable (but not OP) wood elf Necro Ranger follower.

What is a "necro ranger?": besides being good with a bow and one-handed weapons, she reanimates the dead and even summons a piece of her own soul in the form of a copy - an "echo" - of herself.

Specifically, she has powerful reanimate abilities, and can also summon an undead echo of herself for 30 seconds.

[list]
[*]She has a custom class and combat style.
[*]Numerous perks in her skillsets (one-handed, archery, conjuration, block, light armor)
[*]She is marked essential.
[*]Levels with the player from 3 to 100
[/list]

And you thought she was just a pretty face....

[size=4][b][u]Where Do I Find Her?[/u][/b][/size]
She can be found wandering around at [b]Sleeping Tree Giant Camp[/b], west of Fort Greymoor.

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" and "Changelog" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
Download with NMM. Activate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Dismiss follower.
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
No known issues.
Uses only vanilla assets.
Recommended mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

[size=4][b][u]Bugs[/u][/b][/size]
Inconceivable!

author: LazyAltmer

files.name: Niphriel
files.changelogHtml:
Added Echo to CurrentFollowerFaction to avoid friendly-fire issues with the player.
Gave Echo a Hide Shield.
8/4/2012-Added alternate version: Conjure Echo is a spelltome carried by Niphriel rather than being a spell she can cast.

files.name: Niphriel-No Echo
files.changelogHtml:
Added Echo to CurrentFollowerFaction to avoid friendly-fire issues with the player.
Gave Echo a Hide Shield.
8/4/2012-Added alternate version: Conjure Echo is a spelltome carried by Niphriel rather than being a spell she can cast.

files.name: Niphriel
files.changelogHtml:
- Reanimated NPCs no longer create ashpiles. They simply um, die...again...so they can be reanimated repeatedly.
- Changed reanimate spell from "Aimed" to "Target Actor" to avoid poor line-of-sight in the AI.
- Enabled dual wield in the combatstyle. Niphriel will still prefer to use a shield, but take that out of her inventory and she will dual wield.

files.name: Niphriel-No Echo
files.changelogHtml:
- Reanimated NPCs no longer create ashpiles. They simply um, die...again...so they can be reanimated repeatedly.
- Changed reanimate spell from "Aimed" to "Target Actor" to avoid poor line-of-sight in the AI.
- Enabled dual wield in the combatstyle. Niphriel will still prefer to use a shield, but take that out of her inventory and she will dual wield.
